paper_title: Toroidal families and averages of L-functions, I
abstract: We initiate the study of certain families of $L$-functions attached to characters of subgroups of higher-rank tori, and of their average at the central point. In particular, we evaluate the average of the values $L(\demi,χ^a)L(\demi,χ^b)$ for arbitrary integers~$a$ and~$b$ when $χ$ varies of Dirichlet characters of a prime modulus.
